special_abilities: ***Fly My Pretties!*** On initiative count 20, after the first round, 1d4 - 1 (minimum 1) moogle minions appear.
bonus_actions: ***Kick Them In The Kupo!*** Mama Moogle commands a moogle she can see to make a weapon attack.
reactions: ***Eek!*** When an enemy would hit Mama Moogle with an attack, they have to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC {save_dc}) or be forced to give up their attack, as they are awestruck by Mama's magnificence.
